column5: Good luck to everyone this weekend, especially to those heading or at Lakair.  What are your plans?  As for myself, I hadn't the opportunity to do much fishing this year because of the LSAT exam.  I wrote that sucker on Monday and so LET THE GAMES BEGIN.  Going to be headed to the cottage and get some needed inches for TEAM 9  Bringing a bud with me, who never fished in his life.  Gotta get him his liscnce tonite. So I'll be coaching, captaining and casting.  Also, with the gracious offer of Barnie's Band of Gold, I will be testing out Ryan Landry's Black Lures.  Look for a the expirement write up and report upon my return.  Goodluck folks,  reefrunner
I guess it's too early to be thinking about the weekend....
im jealous...  Weed Topp'n HARD this weekend for you and Couters!  tie a spinnerbait onto his line and dont change it! I bet he loses interest within the first hour! lol

Well, my usual fishing partner (fiancee) has a bridal shower to go to on Sunday afternoon...so maybe....just MAYBE I will get out.  somewhere.  Not sure where yet....but if I do, there will be a report.
Well, you know, if he's out with me and loses interests that quick....I hope he can swim.

I want to go perching but if it rains one more time between now and then I can't see the water being anything but chocolate milk so I will bide my time till my favorite bass spot opens next Saturday... and it don't matter how rainy it gets that spot is always crystal clear.
I'm heading down to Woodbridge, we are having my sons second birthday party at my dads place on Saturday.  No fishing for my this weekend.
I might head out to Scugog, but i need to gather camping stuff together for next weekend.
Good luck Raf.......will we see you guys this year?
haha who knows.  we cover pretty much the entire eastern shore now!  good luck to you as well!
i leave early saturday AM for our weeklong houseboat trip in the 1000 islands  cant WAIT
Cutting and hammering cedar in the back yard, and probably cleaning the pool. Other than that, some garden weeding.  Oh, and getting all my stuff ready for the bass opener next week.  JF
May try and get out on Long Point Bay for some pike and perch but most of the weekend will be spent getting ready for our 10 days at the French River starting next Thursday.  8 more sleeps!!!!!!!!!!!
All of the mods will be at Lakair 'cept me. So I have to keep an eye on things for the entire weekend. No sleep for me. Although I am getting double time pay for this.
Still....double of nothin is still nothin! I am sure you will run a tight ship.
